document.full_text: the inspired charge that carried phil mickelson to victory at last year's masters failed to materialize saturday as the big left-hander's hopes of repeating as champion faded at augusta national.
document.title: missed opportunities do not spoil mickelson's day
lines_and_colors: the inspired charge that carried phil mickelson to victory at last year's masters failed to materialize saturday as the big left-hander's hopes of repeating as champion faded at augusta national.
